text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to detail who has standing to file for guardianship up to the fourth degree of kinship (parents, siblings, children, grandparents, uncles/aunts, nephews/nieces, first cousins, or great-grandparents). The candidate answer discusses who decides (Giudice Tutelare) and what documents are needed, but it fails to list or detail the specific relatives who have the legal standing (locus standi) to initiate the *ricorso per amministazione di sostegno* (AdS) petition, which is the core requirement of this criterion.", "criterion_id": "6b32e63e-2504-49aa-b218-0d11c7e8d24e"}
